hero.title: Full Admin V1
hero.subtitle: Your Complete Admin Panel Starter
hero.description: Built with Next.js 16, Prisma, Clerk, RBAC, Themes & i18n - Everything you need to build a production-ready admin panel

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: A complete starter template with all the essential features

authentication.title: Clerk Authentication
authentication.description: Secure authentication with Clerk integration, supporting email/password and social login

rbac.title: Role-Based Access Control
rbac.description: Four roles (GUEST, ADMIN, SUPERADMIN, OWNER) with granular permissions

themes.title: Theme System
themes.description: Multiple themes (Light, Dark, Custom) with color picker and persistent preferences

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: English & Arabic support with RTL layout and easy translation management

database.title: Prisma + PostgreSQL
database.description: Type-safe database access with Prisma ORM and PostgreSQL adapter

ui.title: Modern UI
ui.description: Beautiful components with shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion animations

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: Full type safety across the entire application

configurable.title: Highly Configurable
configurable.description: Easy configuration files for navigation, themes, dashboard, and more

quick_start.subtitle: Get up and running in minutes

step2.title: Configure Environment
step2.description: Set up .env file with your keys

cleanup.title: Cleanup Landing Page
cleanup.subtitle: Remove the landing page and documentation after setup
cleanup.card_description: Once you've finished setting up your project and read all the documentation, you can remove the landing page, setup guide, and documentation viewer to start building your app.
cleanup.warning_description: Files are moved to .trash/ directory (not deleted) so you can recover them if needed. You can delete the .trash/ folder later if you don't need those files.
cleanup.after_cleanup_description: Your root page will be replaced with a simple message:
